ARGUMENT
g

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | evlsvarsrng.q | |- Q = ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) |

| 4 |  | evlsvarsrng.u | |- U = ( S |`s R ) |

| 8 |  | evlsvarsrng.r | |- ( ph -> R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) |

| 12 | 11 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> O = ( ( I evalSub S ) ` B ) ) |

| 18 | 7, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( S |`s B ) = S ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ph -> S = ( S |`s B ) ) |

| 23 | 22 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( I evalSub S ) ` B ) ` ( V ` X ) ) = ( ( ( I evalSub S ) ` B ) ` ( ( I mVar ( S |`s B ) ) ` X ) ) ) |

| 25 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mVar ( S |`s B ) ) = ( I mVar ( S |`s B ) ) |

| 30 | 24, 25, 26, 5, 6, 7, 29, 9 | #P_evlsvar | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( I evalSub S ) ` B ) ` ( ( I mVar ( S |`s B ) ) ` X ) ) = ( g e. ( B ^m I ) |-> ( g ` X ) ) ) |
